name: Buzzle Fall
description:
BUZZLE FALL!

You are falling through the sky on a platform, in the Bozolia Solar System. Don't fall off or you will DIE!

Credits:
Rowan Abbott - Graphic Design/Scripting/Music/Producer.
Owen Hardman - Ideas for updates.
Alex Bateson - Ideas for updates/Tester.
www.bensound.com - Music.

If you find any problems or would like to tell us an idea for the game in future updates, go to: www.zenhap.xyz and click Buzzle.
